title: Subtitles : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: Ticket Booking Queries : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Will the movie screen with subtitles in my preferred cinema/show?
Your wish is our command! Currently, we have limited cinemas that are able to share information about subtitle availability.
If the information is unavailable as displayed below, that means the cinema has not provided the relevant information. In such scenario, the relevant cinema would be at the best place to inquire about the availability of subtitles.
